content.question: Voltaire’s ability to publish the ideas presented in the “Treatise on Toleration” best reflects which of the following?

choices.label: The spread of print media that popularized Enlightenment ideas
The continued influence of traditional forms of knowledge, such as classical texts, in the eighteenth century
The changing demographics of European society during the commercial revolution
The effective end of religious conflicts between Catholics and Protestants during the Enlightenment

content.answer: The spread of print media that popularized Enlightenment ideas

topic.text: 4.1: Contextualizing the Scientific Revolution and Enlightenment

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
